answerText: Laplace transform[10] The Laplace transform applied to this function, when it hasn't been shifted, is equal to one.
heading: NASAT |2013 | 12 | 19 | Science | Math | College
subject: Science
question: Question: When given an input of e to the a t, this operation yields one over s minus a. For 10 points each: [10] Name this transformation that converts functions from the time domain to s-domain. It involves integrating the product of a function times e to the negative s times t, from zero to infinity.
